item.description:
Boston Restaurant Week Winter 2007
Sunday, March 4 through Friday, March 9

It appears VERY difficult if in fact, impossible, to get reservations for more than 4 people during restaurant week. Sooooo, I've taken the liberty to make several reservations through out the week. So please RSVP (and HONOR it!) to one you can make -- they will be intimate foursomes. If no RSVPs fill that particular date 3 days in advance I will cancel the reservation.

THURS, March 8 --
Aquitaine Bis in Chestnut Hill

7:30 pm for 4 ppl
and
8:00 pm for 4 ppl as well

Well meet before and after in the bar and mix and mingle at tables!

Address:
11 Boylston St, Chestnut Hill, MA 02467
Phone Number:(617) 734-8400

Aquitaine Bis brings Paris and one of Boston's favorite Bistros to the suburbs. Executive Chef Seth Woods' seasonal menu will feature all the favorites and traditions of Aquitaine - Bar a Vin Bistrot in the South End along with new items created specifically for the Newton location.

Map:
http://maps.yahoo.com...

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Restaurant Week - Aquitaine Bis
